name: Guilty Gear XX Accent Core Plus
name_original: Guilty Gear XX Accent Core Plus
description:
The fighting franchise that launched an entirely new style of fighting games is celebrating its 10th anniversary with the most complete and definitive version of the game on the PlayStation®Portable. Follow the stories of the 25 crazy combatants and dish out a mind-numbing amount of insane combos that the series is known for.
Players can access a digital copy of the manual at its official website at http://www.aksysgames.com.
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
